overview: Brandon Hance is considered a visionary in the social commerce industry. His combination of music industry expertise and social networking research set the stage for the development of Inhance Media where he created a division specifically focused on artist services: Audiolife. He is an extraordinary leader and a two-time national championship quarterback for the USC Trojans. Personal credits also include an advanced degree from USC’s Thornton School of Music, also earning academic awards and honors from the Marshall School of Business, the Thornton School of Music, and Pac 10. His music industry career includes talent management at The Firm in Beverly Hills, where he worked with platinum artists such as Snoop Dogg, Linkin Park, Limp Bizkit, Korn, Ice Cube, Backstreet Boys, Kelly Clarkson and Enrique Iglesias among many others.

milestones.source_description: Audiolife Announces Public Beta Launch: Indie Artists And Music Industry Pros Hail New On-Demand Technology As The Future Of Promoting And Selling Music and Merchandise Online
